title:
There was recent coverage regarding excessive HOA fee\'s, fines, and unregulated control of property owners.

Has anything new developed in the General Assembly to address these problems, if so, who can Homeowners contact to submit complaints and grievances?
text:
This recent story at StarNewsOnline.com should answer your question:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20110119/ARTICLES/110119562
